properties.seoTitle: Furnished 1 Bedroom Rental in Pensacola Near UWF & NAS | MiCasa
properties.seoDescription: Quiet, fully furnished 1-bedroom rental in Pensacola near UWF, NAS, and Navy Federal. Move-in ready with utilities available. Ideal for travel nurses, military, and professionals.
properties.name: 1625 Rebecca Street
properties.fullDescription: This quiet, newly renovated 4-unit furnished apartment community in Pensacola is designed for comfortable, stress-free living. Located on a safe cul-de-sac and set on nearly half an acre, the property offers a peaceful residential feel while staying close to major employers, military bases, hospitals, beaches, and downtown. All units are fully furnished and move-in ready, making this property a great fit for travel nurses, military personnel, remote workers, and professionals seeking flexible monthly rentals. Residents enjoy a clean, quiet environment with shared amenities including a large tree-lined yard, fire pit, grill, gazebo, volleyball net, and on-site shared laundry. Conveniently located just minutes from Navy Federal, UWF, West Florida Hospital, NAS Pensacola, and about 25 minutes from Pensacola Beach, this small community offers an ideal balance of privacy and accessibility. Monthly rent includes all utilities and internet, providing a simple, all-inclusive living option in Pensacola.

properties.seoTitle: Gated 3 Bedroom Apartments in Downtown Pensacola | MiCasa Rentals
properties.seoDescription: Modern gated 3-bedroom apartments in downtown Pensacola near Oar House Marina. Resort-style amenities, parking, and select garage access. Close to NAS and beaches.
properties.name: 1810 W Gadsden Community
properties.fullDescription: This modern, exclusive gated 4-unit apartment community in downtown Pensacola was built in 2022–2023 and features four spacious 3-bedroom, 2-bath fully furnished units in a secure, resort-style setting. Conveniently located near downtown Pensacola, Oar House Marina, and top local restaurants, the property is less than 20 minutes from Pensacola Beach. Each unit offers high ceilings, abundant natural light, modern furnishings, smart TVs, a Keurig coffee maker, and a fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, making the community ideal for both short- and mid-term stays. Residents enjoy a fully fenced shared backyard with two grills, fire pit, pergola, gazebo, volleyball net, cornhole, and outdoor dining areas surrounded by mature palm trees, designed to comfortably accommodate multiple groups while maintaining privacy and a relaxed atmosphere. The community provides secure rear parking with up to three vehicles per unit, off-street parking, and garage parking access for select units. The location offers quick access to NAS Pensacola (under 20 minutes) and major employment centers, making it well suited for military personnel, travel nurses, remote workers, and professionals. Advertised rent does not include utilities; a utility bundle is available for $400 per month and includes power, water, trash, sanitation, and internet. This gated downtown Pensacola community combines space, comfort, and location in a setting designed to feel like home.

properties.seoTitle: 3 Bedroom Duplex Rentals in Downtown Pensacola | MiCasa Rentals
properties.seoDescription: Spacious 3-bedroom duplex rentals in downtown Pensacola near NAS and Oar House Marina. Private yards, garage parking, and close to beaches.
properties.name: 1918 W Gadsden Duplex
properties.fullDescription: Spacious 3-bedroom duplex units with garage parking and private fenced backyard for each unit. Advertised price does not include utilities. Utility bundle available for $400/month (Power, Water, Trash, Sanitation, Internet).

properties.seoTitle: 2 Bedroom Duplex Rental in Pensacola Near UWF & West Florida Hospital | MiCasa
properties.seoDescription: Comfortable 2-bedroom duplex rentals in Pensacola's Yacht Harbor area near UWF and West Florida Hospital. King beds, office space, yard, and easy beach access.
properties.name: 4969 Yacht Harbor Drive
properties.fullDescription: This quiet 2-unit duplex in Pensacola's Yacht Harbor area offers two comfortable 2-bedroom apartments in a convenient residential location near UWF, West Florida Hospital, Navy Federal, and local beaches. Ideal for travel nurses, professionals, remote workers, and extended stays, each single-story unit includes two king-size beds, a fully equipped kitchen, a 58" smart TV, fast Wi-Fi, two dedicated work desks, a dining area, and an in-unit washer and dryer. Both units share access to a fully fenced backyard with shady trees, a small patio, and a grill—perfect for relaxing outdoors after a long day. Free parking is available for two or more vehicles per unit. Recent updates include granite countertops, refreshed cabinets, updated appliances, and fresh paint; while improved, this remains an older property and may have minor imperfections, reflected in its value-focused pricing. Drive times include Pensacola Beach (25 minutes), Perdido Key (33 minutes), Downtown Pensacola (16 minutes), Navy Federal (7 minutes), UWF (10 minutes), Pensacola Airport (10 minutes), West Florida Hospital (11 minutes), and NAS Pensacola (23 minutes). Advertised price does not include utilities. Utility bundle available for $250/month (Power, Water, Trash, Sanitation, Internet).
